alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 24 at 8:09PM CDT until September 24 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ELLIS AND WESTERN NAVARRO COUNTIES... At 808 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blooming Grove, or 14 miles west of Corsicana, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Ennis, Blooming Grove, Dawson, Bardwell, Angus, Barry, Navarro, Bardwell Lake, Navarro Mills Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Frost, Retreat, Oak Valley, Richland, Streetman, Emhouse, Mustang, Dresden, and Avalon. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
